/* JSX Java script syntax extension - allows you to write HTML in javascript Templates inside javascript Single parent element in HTML - so need to put everything into a single main DIV or other element. Could even put it into a fragment <> Element with no name Can't call HTML classes class in JSX, must call it className as JS will get confused with a JS class and not a HTML Class' Attributes are camelCase in JSX. */import'./App.scss';//Renamed the css file to .scss import React,{Component,useEffect,useState,useRef}from"react";import WellComeHere from'./WellComeHere';import Support from'./Support';import HauntedPika from'./HauntedPika';import Modals from'./Modals';import Nav from'./Nav';// This is a comment /* This is also a comment */ // The following is a class that uses a constructor to return stuff to the html when called import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";class Welcome extends Component{//Component name must be Alphabetized. This could also be class Welcome extends react.Component{ constructor(props){super(props);this.state={text:"(This text is from a constructor in the Welcome class)"};}render(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[this.props.name,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})," This is a paragraph rendered from the Welcome class ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),this.state.text]})});}}const Welcomes=props=>{//This is a hook return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["This is a paragraph from a hook ",props.name]})});};/* Hooks into react */function App(){const name='Sean';// Can define variables and pass them through into the HTML // Can define style for html elements but they need to be passed through as an object like let[thingInfo,setThingInfo]=useState(null);const[member,setCast]=useState([]);/* Setting a constant for holding data. useState will generate the state */async function fetchStuff(){// Async function expects something to be returned. const response=await fetch('cast.json');// Can only use Await in an async function. Pauses function until promosed thing is resolved setCast(await response.json());}const initialized=useRef(false);//Determines if initialized useEffect(()=>{if(!initialized.current){//If intialised is currently false fetches cast.json file. initialized.current=true;//Sets the constant to true to avoid fetching the data again. fetchStuff();}},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("article",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("hgroup",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:"white",backgroundColor:"orange"},children:"SNichols.co.nz"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[name,"'s Website"]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["This website uses ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:"React"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"You need to enable JavaScript to run this app.",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"If you can read this, you have Javascript enabled"]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Welcome,{name:"I'm a 'props'"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Welcomes,{name:"not ditto"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(WellComeHere,{name:"- this is a hook from WellComeHere.jsx"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{style:{height:"184px",width:"184px"},src:"/lock.ico",alt:"This is a lock"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{style:{height:"184px",width:"184px"},src:"https://sni53.github.io/sni53/eso1907a.bmp",alt:"This is large"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{style:{height:"184px",width:"184px"},src:"/sean.ico",alt:"This is my logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"notContainer",style:{color:"Orange"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{backgroundColor:"black"},children:"This is also a paragraph"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"outline",onClick:()=>alert('Why did you do this? :('),children:"Please don't click on me :("}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Support,{thinginfo:thingInfo})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HauntedPika,{onChoice:info=>{setThingInfo(info);}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"thisModalWasHiddenBecauseItWasAnnoying",style:{zIndex:"10",position:"absolute",paddingTop:"100px",paddingLeft:"690px"},children:thingInfo&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modals,{member:thingInfo,handleChange:info=>{setThingInfo(member[info]);},handleClose:()=>{setThingInfo(null);}})})]})}),thingInfo&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"thingInfo",style:{display:"block",color:"Yellow"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:thingInfo.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["This is ",thingInfo.slug,".png"]})]})]})// the backslash is required for the closing tag and single tag elements like and
in react. ;// Arrow functions () = > return things }// && means if exists do this export default App;
